text: Little Caesars is what it is. The pizza is fine and the price is so cheap which is awesome. …More

name: Gerry Spraitzar
text: Hot and Ready is of good value.  I had the pepperoni.  Can also get lots more pepperoni for just $1 more.  large size...will go again.  Had to wait 15 minutes till it was finished.  Located in   K-Mart.

name: Andrew Sager
text: Management. Don’t have this little cesar’s open if your only going to have one person on staff. i love little cesar’s but when you say your going to be open till 9, but be inconveniently closing at 5:30 every single time i come in is not …More

name: Kimberly VanderVeen
text: Tonight we stopped by around 7:30 pm. They said they had to close early because they ran out of dough. Online it states they are open until 9 pm. It was convenient that the manager was 18-21 year old and it happens to be Friday night. I'll never waste my time trying the Burlington, Washington Little Caesars again.

name: James Simmons
text: Went by two days in a row and the first day the didn't have any pizZa dough ready. Today the are close when it says they should be open tell 8. Get better management.

name: Elizabeth Pitner
text: Unfortunately one star is the minimum amount given on google. Zero stars is a more accurate review for this place with everything falling apartment, disgusting pizza, dirty pitchers of water sitting by the fountain drink machine, bathroom …More

name: Randy Hunt
text: Stopped in at 5 pm to get a pizza for dinner and was told by the employee that she was closed so she could eat her dinner. Really? I should not have had high expectations for anything located in a Kmart. I will never go back and suggest you go elsewhere.

name: James Graham
text: These people need to revoke the "hot and ready" slogan as in all the years there been in Kmart not once had my pizza ever been hot or ready. One time I ordered a pizza and shipped for about 20 mins. Come to pick up pizza and guy says be …More

text: Went in and they wouldn't even act like I was there

name: Nikki Butler
text: Seriously the worst little Caesar I have ever been too. Nothing is stocked,  tables and floors are gross. Is not even busy. So they obviously just don't want to clean. Manager is rude also for no reason

name: Ryan Gardner
text: This place is pretty bad.   Every single time except once that I have tried to call over the past few months nobody answers.  I've called five or six times in a row over the course of 15 minutes, on multiple occasions, and nobody answers …More

text: There is black plastic in coming out of their soda machine that they haven't fixed after 6 months. Pizza and customer service is good other than that.

text: One of the workers was very friendly and polite, the other was a bit rude. The ovens need to either be fixed or replaced. It shows poor management when a hot and ready takes over 15 minutes and it was burnt with almost zero sauce and the …More
